scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Blogs_BlogTitle_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($seoTitle = false) #set($title = false) #set($page = $core_v2_blogUrls.Current) #if($page == 'BlogPost') #set($blogPost = $core_v2_blogPost.Current) #set($title = $blogPost.Title) #set($seoTitle = $blogPost.MetaTitle) #elseif ($page == 'AddBlogPost') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_BlogTitle_AddPost')) #elseif ($page == 'EditBlogPost') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_BlogTitle_EditPost'), $core_v2_blogPost.Current.Title)) #elseif ($page == 'UserBlogs') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_BlogTitle_UsersBlogPosts'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($page == 'AddBlog') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_CreateBlog')) #elseif ($page == 'Day') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatDate($core_v2_utility.ParseDate($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('y'), $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('m'), $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('d')))) #elseif ($page == 'Month') #set($title = $core_v2_utility.ParseDate( $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue("y"), $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue("m"), $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('d')).ToString('MMMM, yyyy')) #elseif ($page == 'Bloggers') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Blog_Breadcrumbs_Bloggers')) #elseif ($page == 'Contact') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Contact')) #elseif ($page == 'About') #set($title = $core_v2_blog.Current.AboutTitle) #elseif ($page == 'LinkList') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Weblog_Link_Links')) #elseif ($page == 'Tags') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('TagBrowser_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Search') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Search')) #elseif ($page == 'CustomPage') #set($title = $core_v2_customPage.Current.Title) #end #if ($page == 'Blog') $core_v2_page.SetTitle('', true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$core_v2_blog.Current.Name

#end #elseif ($title) #if (!$seoTitle || $seoTitle == '') #set($seoTitle = $title) #end $core_v2_page.SetTitle($seoTitle, true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$title

#end #else $core_v2_page.SetTitle($core_v2_language.GetResource('Core_ApplicationNavigation_Blogs'), true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Core_ApplicationNavigation_Blogs')

#end #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Blogs_BlogTitle_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="visible" labelResourceName="Title_Visible" defaultValue="False" dataType="Bool" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Blog_Breadcrumbs_Bloggers">Bloggers</resource> <resource name="Blogs_BlogTitle_Description">Displays the title for blog pages.</resource> <resource name="Blogs_BlogTitle_Name">Blog - Title</resource> <resource name="CF_BlogTitle_AddPost">Add Post</resource> <resource name="CF_BlogTitle_EditPost">Edit '{0}'</resource> <resource name="CF_BlogTitle_UsersBlogPosts">{0}'s Blog Posts</resource> <resource name="CF_CreateBlog">Create Blog</resource> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="Contact">Contact</resource> <resource name="Core_ApplicationNavigation_Blogs">Blogs</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="Search">Search</resource> <resource name="TagBrowser_Title">Browse by Tags</resource> <resource name="Title_Visible">Show the title in the page</resource> <resource name="Weblog_Link_Links">Links</resource> </language>
